name: 「INFINITE⯁LEGACY」
description:
Wield the power of the Demon Hand to do battle with the Demon King Xvexzious 

Made for PIGsquad's 2021 Cliffhanger Summer Slow Jam, with the the creative theme of "This isn't even my final form"

Expect updates in the very near future :)

Controls

KeyboardControllerMoveArrow KeysLeft StickJumpZBottom Face ButtonShootXLeft Face ButtonPausePStartReset LevelRSelectDodge RollLeft CtrlRight TriggerExit GameEsc

Created by: Corwyn Prichard, David Zuniga, Coleman Moore
